title: Digital World: Audio Clipping and Merging
addAudioTip1: Currently only supports MP3 format audio
addAudioTip2: If there are other formats of audio, please convert the format to MP3 first.
startTimeTip: Set the start time in the audio control bar
endTimeTip: Set the end time in the audio control bar
addDirTip: Will find all audio files in the selected folder and subfolders
audioBitrateTip: The higher the value, the better the audio image quality, but also the larger the volume
delConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
settingTimeTip1: The audio is currently being cut and this operation cannot be performed
settingTimeTip2: The end time must be greater than the start time
